column4: Hi everybody. Please help me to delete a file from trash. I am not able to delete it from trash. Seems permission problem. I tried to delete it from terminal. But there is no .Trash file. I am using Hardy. Please help me....

ï»¿ Hi everybody. Please help me to delete a file from trash. I am not able to delete it from trash. Seems permission problem. I tried to delete it from terminal. But there is no .Trash file. I am using Hardy. Please help me....
go into the folder wher trash is stored and rm the file
